  • API

Book Notes

[Instructions]
  • Enter a book title to add a new book.
  • Once a book title is added, you can add notes by clicking the book title and entering a value in the "New Note" box and clicking the "Add Note" button.
  • You can delete a book by clicking the "Delete Book" button.

by Alex Olivera: (oalex90@gmail.com)
